itunes:title: FEB 10 2022 - PM TRUDEAU THREATENS AMERICANS WHO DONATED TO FREEDOM CONVOY
title: FEB 10 2022 - PM TRUDEAU THREATENS AMERICANS WHO DONATED TO FREEDOM CONVOY
description:
Prime Minister Trudeau threatens to ‘target’ Americans who have donated to the truck freedom convoy in Canada, meanwhile Kamala Harris will travel to Munich, Germany soon to discuss the possible invasion by Russia on Ukraine, the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 4th Circuit revoked 2 permits to complete the Mountain Valley Pipeline project, and Judicial Watch and CatholicVote have filed a lawsuit against DHS and HHS for allegedly helping illegal immigrants. 




Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
content:encoded:
Prime Minister Trudeau threatens to ‘target’ Americans who have donated to the truck freedom convoy in Canada, meanwhile Kamala Harris will travel to Munich, Germany soon to discuss the possible invasion by Russia on Ukraine, the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 4th Circuit revoked 2 permits to complete the Mountain Valley Pipeline project, and Judicial Watch and CatholicVote have filed a lawsuit against DHS and HHS for allegedly helping illegal immigrants. 




Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
itunes:author: Turning Point USA
